modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod makes it so when you are hit by a stripper zombie you will get herpes. Mod originally written for A17, likely works with A18.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod makes it so when you are hit by a stripper [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) you will get herpes.

Doughphunghus’s fork – updates:

* Mod originally written for A17, likely works with A18.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a18/tree/main/Khelldon-GetTheHerp)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khelldon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khelldon/), [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
